aadhaar.summary: Aadhaar is a 12-digit unique identity number issued by UIDAI to residents of India.
aadhaar.child: Children under 5: only photograph captured; biometrics must be updated at ages 5 and 15.
aadhaar.cost: Initial enrolment is free; updates may have a nominal fee at official centers.
aadhaar.download: e-Aadhaar can often be downloaded within a few days from https://myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in using the Enrolment ID.
aadhaar.privacy: Do not share Aadhaar number publicly. Use masked Aadhaar when possible.

pan.summary: Permanent Account Number (PAN) is a 10-character alphanumeric ID issued by the Income Tax Department for tax purposes.
pan.use: PAN is required for high-value financial transactions and income tax filings.
pan.apply: Apply online via NSDL/e-Gov or UTIITSL portals linked from https://www.incometax.gov.in.

pm kisan.summary: PM-Kisan provides income support to eligible farmer families.
pm kisan.benefit: Qualified farmers receive periodic direct benefit transfers (DBT) to their bank accounts.
pm kisan.eligibility: Excludes institutional landholders and certain higher-income categories; verification via land records.
